## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e1cb0428ec77f27833f104360225710f2669706df0702c7779e3cf3f1b4946d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@cartus-core/cartus-common-ui' @ 200000001.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
